techmeme.title: Nothing unveils the $199 CMF Phone 1, with swappable parts, a 6.67" display, MediaTek SoC, and Nothing OS, alongside the $69 CMF Watch Pro 2 and $59 Buds Pro 2 (Julian Chokkattu/Wired)
Internal memo: Microsoft tells staff in China that from September 2024 they can only use iPhones for work, including to verify identities, affecting hundreds (Bloomberg)
What to expect from Samsung Galaxy Unpacked on July 10: Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Flip 6, Galaxy AI updates, Galaxy Buds 3, Watch FE and Watch 7 Ultra, and more (Wes Davis/The Verge)
The National Samsung Electronics Union goes on a three-day strike for better pay; analysts: the strike is unlikely to have an impact due to low participation (Reuters)
A Sequoia Capital analyst estimated companies developing top AI models need to collectively generate ~$600B per year to pay for their AI infrastructure (Anton Shilov/Tom's Hardware)
